evidence.text: Trial will commence on Monday, March 11, 2024, at 8:00 am before the District Judge without a jury.
Final Pretrial Conference: The final pretrial conference shall be held on February 29, 2024, at 2:00 p.m.

extracted.value: Final Pretrial Conference scheduled for February 29, 2024

evidence.text: the evidentiary hearing on the United States Motion for Preliminary Injunction (Rec. Doc. 9) will be combined with a bench trial.

extracted.value: Evidentiary hearing combined with bench trial

evidence.text: the trial set for March 11, 2024 and the pre-trial conference set for February 29, 2024 are hereby continued and shall be reset at another date.
